title: "Skoreparation Framåt" Copperplate-ish sans with tiny serifs on shop window
author: 1UP

comments.content: This is probably some sign painter’s alphabet. It is quite possible it has no equivalent in digital type.

For some reason, i remember it being called “Cigar Store Lettering” but I can’t remember why.

ChrisL

dezcom/Chris: Is the font called that? Or is it a shop that does hand lettering? Couldn’t google it and find a font.

Cheers.

Hand lettering style, I don’t know of a matching typeface. Sorry.

ChrisL

Not the same, but try out Parkinson’s Modesto.

hhp

I second Hrant’s nomination of Modesto, and also offer these suggestions:

Copperplate Condensed Bold  
 [http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/copperplate-gothic/bold-condensed...](http://web.archive.org/web/20091205085847/http:/new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/copperplate-gothic/bold-condensed/ "http://new.myfonts.com/fonts/bitstream/copperplate-gothic/bold-condensed/")

LHF Hensler  
 [http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/hensler.shtml](http://web.archive.org/web/20091205085847/http:/www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/hensler.shtml "http://www.letterheadfonts.com/fonts/hensler.shtml")

Berthold’s Flange is another similar style (at MyFonts — sorry, I can’t link with no mouse). There may be some other styles you could find using my Serif Font ID Guide.

- Mike Yanega

It’s posting from his iphone day :-)

ChrisL
